prime.gui.effects.effectInstances.IEffectInstance<TargetType, PropertiesType>

type
interface
extends
prime.core.traits.IDisposable
available in
swf

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

effect(default,null) : PropertiesType

ended(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal0

Event that is dispatched when the effect is finished or stopped

isReverted(default,null) : Bool

Flag indicating if the effect should play reverted or not

started(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal0

Event that is dispatched when the effect starts playing

state(default,null) : prime.gui.states.EffectStates

State of the effect

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

dispose() : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IDisposable

isPlaying() : Bool

Getter indicating wether the effect is playing or not

isWaiting() : Bool

Getter indicating wether the effect is waiting on the delay to finish before it starts playing

play(?withEffect : Bool, ?directly : Bool) : Void

Method will play the effect

playWithEffect() : Void

Method is called after the hideTimer has finished running. It will apply the changed values with an effect.

playWithoutEffect() : Void

Method is called after the hideTimer has finished running. It will apply the changed values without an effect.

reset() : Void

revert(?withEffect : Bool, ?directly : Bool) : Void

Method will play the effect in oppposite direction

setValues(v : prime.gui.effects.EffectProperties) : Void

see
EffectProperties
Method to set the explicit start and end values of the effect

stop() : Void

Method will stop the effect
